channel.title: Emotes Never End

item.title: Emotes Never End
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

My emotes keep repeating, they never stop, here is my setanimation:

	public void setAnimation(int i) {
		pEmote = i;
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
	}

Read full topic
